original: Nanu saṅgho āhuneyyo pāhuneyyo dakkhiṇeyyo añjalikaraṇīyo anuttaraṁ puññakkhettaṁ lokassāti?
analyzed: nanu saṅghaḥ āhuneyyaḥ pāhuneyyaḥ dakkhiṇeyyaḥ añjali karaṇīyaḥ anuttaram puñña khettam lokassa ati

original: Hañci saṅgho āhuneyyo pāhuneyyo dakkhiṇeyyo añjalikaraṇīyo anuttaraṁ puññakkhettaṁ lokassa, tena vata re vattabbe—
analyzed: hañci saṅghaḥ āhuneyyaḥ pāhuneyyaḥ dakkhiṇeyyaḥ añjali karaṇīyaḥ anuttaram puñña kkhettam lokassa tena vata re vattabbe

original: Nanu cattāro purisayugā aṭṭha purisapuggalā dakkhiṇeyyā vuttā bhagavatāti?
analyzed: nanu cattāro purisa yugā aṭṭha purisa puggalāḥ dakkhiṇeyyāḥ vuttāḥ bhagavatā ati

original: Hañci cattāro purisayugā aṭṭha purisapuggalā dakkhiṇeyyā vuttā bhagavatā, tena vata re vattabbe—
analyzed: hañci cattāro purisa yugā aṭṭha purisa puggalāḥ dakkhiṇeyyāḥ vuttāḥ bhagavatā tena vata re vattabbe

original: Nanu atthi keci saṅghassa dānaṁ dentīti?
analyzed: nanu atthi keci saṅghassa dānam denti iti

original: Hañci atthi keci saṅghassa dānaṁ denti, tena vata re vattabbe—
analyzed: hañci atthi keci saṅghassa dānam denti tena vata re vattabbe

original: Nanu atthi keci saṅghassa cīvaraṁ denti …pe…
analyzed: nanu atthi keci saṅghassa cīvaram denti pe

original: Hañci atthi keci saṅghassa pānīyaṁ denti, tena vata re vattabbe—
analyzed: hañci atthi keci saṅghassa pānīyam denti tena vata re vattabbe
tena hi saṅghaḥ dakkhiṇam paṭiggaṇhāti iti

original: Na vattabbaṁ saṅgho dakkhiṇaṁ paṭiggaṇhātītikathā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: na vattabbam saṅghaḥ dakkhiṇam paṭiggaṇhāti iti kathā niṭṭhitā
